org.eclipse.ecf.discovery
Interface IDiscoveryContainerAdapter

public interface IDiscoveryContainerAdapter

Entry point discovery container adapter. This interface exposes the ability to add/remove listeners for newly discovered services and service types, register and unregister locally provided services, and get (synch) and request (asynch) service info from a remote service provider.

This interface can be used by container provider implementations as an adapter so that calls to IContainer.getAdapter(IDiscoveryContainerAdapter.class) will return a non-null instance of a class that implements this interface. Clients can then proceed to use this interface to interact with the given discovery implementation.

Method Detail

addServiceListener

void addServiceListener(ServiceID type,
                        IServiceListener listener)
Add a service listener. The given listener will have its method called when a service with a type matching that specified by the first parameter is discovered.

Parameters:
type - the ServiceID of the desired type to listen for
listener - the listener to be notified

removeServiceListener

void removeServiceListener(ServiceID type,
                           IServiceListener listener)
Remove a service listener. Remove the listener associated with the type specified by the first parameter.

Parameters:
type - the ServiceID of the desired type to remove the listener
listener - the listener to be removed

addServiceTypeListener

void addServiceTypeListener(IServiceTypeListener listener)
Add a service type listener. The given listener will have its method called when a service type is discovered.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be notified

removeServiceTypeListener

void removeServiceTypeListener(IServiceTypeListener listener)
Remove a service type listener. Remove the type listener.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to be removed

registerServiceType

void registerServiceType(ServiceID serviceType)
Register the given service type. This publishes the given service type to the underlying publishing mechanism

Parameters:
serviceType - the ServiceID of the type to be published

registerServiceType

void registerServiceType(java.lang.String serviceType)
Register the given service type. This publishes the given service type to the underlying publishing mechanism

Parameters:
serviceType - the String of the type to be published

registerService

void registerService(IServiceInfo serviceInfo)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Register the given service. This publishes the service defined by the first parameter to the underlying publishing mechanism

Parameters:
serviceInfo - the IServiceInfo of the service to be published
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getServiceInfo

IServiceInfo getServiceInfo(ServiceID service,
                            int timeout)
Synchronously (within given timeout) retrieve info about the service defined by the first parameter.

Parameters:
service - the ServiceID of the service to get info about
timeout - the time to wait for a response (in ms)
Returns:
IServiceInfo the service info retrieved. Null if no information retrieved within timeout.

requestServiceInfo

void requestServiceInfo(ServiceID service,
                        int timeout)
Asynchronously (within given timeout) retrieve info about the service defined by the first parameter. Sends a request for service information and returns. Answers to such requests occur via the IServiceListener.resolveService() method.

Parameters:
service - the ServiceID of the service to get info about
timeout - the time to wait for a response (in ms)

unregisterService

void unregisterService(IServiceInfo serviceInfo)
Unregister service defined by serviceInfo.

Parameters:
serviceInfo - the info defining the service to unregister

getServices

IServiceInfo[] getServices(ServiceID type)
Get service info about all known services of given service type

Parameters:
type - the ServiceID defining the type of service we are interested in getting service info about
Returns:
IServiceInfo[] the resulting array of service info instances
